content: Thank you for the clarification. In that case, the experiences at ADD may not be as relevant to the article about the reasons for working at Palantir as they are not aligned with Palantir's agile development methodology. However, the experiences at ADD may still be relevant to the overall career profile and may demonstrate your versatility in working in different development environments and methodologies. You can highlight your experiences at ADD in your resume or CV, and mention them briefly during interviews to demonstrate your versatility and adaptability in different work environments.
